This view is used in financial or budgetary applications where understanding the status of base rates is crucial. It provides a snapshot of base rates along with their current status in the budgeting process.
Reporting on base rates and their current status in financial systems.
Supporting decision-making processes by providing a clear view of which base rates are locked due to current projections or budgets.
Facilitating audits or reviews by providing a comprehensive view of base rate data and its associated statuses.
